MEDIEVAL_EUROPEAN.description: A classic European aristocratic family, navigating feudal politics, chivalry, and dynastic marriages.
MEDIEVAL_EUROPEAN.llm_persona_prompt: You are a medieval European chronicler, writing in a formal and slightly florid style, like Froissart or Orderic Vitalis. Focus on lineage, chivalry, and divine providence or misfortune.

events.name: Bountiful Harvest
events.narrative: The Lord smiled upon {location_flavor}; a bountiful harvest filled the granaries of House {dynasty_name} this year.

events.name: Harsh Winter
events.narrative: A bitter winter gripped {location_flavor}. Stores dwindled and the weak suffered in House {dynasty_name}.

events.name: Localized Sickness
events.narrative: A worrying sickness, the 'sweating ill', afflicted {location_flavor}. House {dynasty_name} prayed for deliverance as some, both high and low, succumbed.

events.name: Grand Tournament
events.narrative: House {dynasty_name} hosted a grand tournament, drawing knights from afar. Much coin was spent, but honor was contested and prestige gained (or lost for the unchivalrous!).

events.name: Noble Pilgrimage
events.narrative: The leader of House {dynasty_name} undertook a long and arduous pilgrimage to a holy shrine, seeking divine favor and returning with renewed piety (or so it is said).

VIKING_SAGAS.description: A Norse clan in the age of raids, exploration, and the forging of kingdoms. Glory in battle and cunning are prized.
VIKING_SAGAS.llm_persona_prompt: You are a Norse Skald, reciting an epic saga. Your tone is stark, focused on deeds, lineage, fate (wyrd), and moments of high drama or grim humor. Use kennings occasionally.

events.name: Successful Raid
events.narrative: The longships of House {dynasty_name} returned, keels heavy with plunder and their warriors' hearts alight with the glory of a successful raid on {rival_coast_name}!

events.name: Blood Feud Erupts
events.narrative: A bitter blood feud, a legacy of spilled mead and sharp words, erupted between House {dynasty_name} and the clan of {rival_clan_name}. Many good warriors may fall before this is settled.

events.name: Great Thing Assembles
events.narrative: The Jarls and chieftains of {location_flavor} gathered for a great Thing (assembly). Laws were debated, disputes settled, and House {dynasty_name} sought to increase its influence among the free folk.

FEUDAL_JAPAN.description: A noble clan in feudal Japan, navigating the complex world of samurai, honor, and shifting alliances during the Sengoku period.
FEUDAL_JAPAN.llm_persona_prompt: You are a Japanese court chronicler, writing with elegant formality. Focus on honor, duty, the changing seasons, and the impermanence of power. Use occasional poetic imagery and references to nature.

events.name: Clan War
events.narrative: War has erupted between Clan {dynasty_name} and a rival clan. The fields of {location_flavor} will soon be stained with blood as samurai march to battle.

events.name: Diplomatic Tea Ceremony
events.narrative: The {dynasty_name} Clan hosted an elaborate tea ceremony for neighboring lords. Amid the careful ritual and beautiful simplicity, important alliances were formed.

events.name: Cherry Blossom Festival
events.narrative: As cherry blossoms fell like snow across {location_flavor}, Clan {dynasty_name} celebrated with poetry, sake, and contemplation of life's beautiful impermanence.

events.name: Ninja Assassination Attempt
events.narrative: Shadows moved in the night as shinobi infiltrated the {dynasty_name} compound. The clan's guards were alert, but would they be enough to prevent tragedy?

events.name: Shogun's Favor
events.narrative: The Shogun has shown great favor to Clan {dynasty_name}, granting new lands and privileges. With such favor comes jealousy from other clans.

COLONIAL_SOUTH_AMERICA_SAGA.description: A powerful family in colonial South America, balancing European ties with local power during the tumultuous colonial period and wars of independence.
COLONIAL_SOUTH_AMERICA_SAGA.llm_persona_prompt: You are a colonial chronicler in South America, writing with a mix of European formality and local color. Focus on the tensions between Old World and New, the wealth of the land, and the complex social hierarchies of colonial society.

events.name: Silver Vein Discovery
events.narrative: Fortune has smiled upon the {dynasty_name} family! A rich new vein of silver has been discovered in their mines, promising great wealth.

events.name: Plantation Revolt
events.narrative: The enslaved workers on the {dynasty_name} plantations have risen in revolt, burning fields and demanding freedom. Blood has been spilled on both sides.

events.name: Royal Appointment
events.narrative: The Crown has appointed a member of the {dynasty_name} family to a prestigious position in the colonial government, increasing the family's influence in {location_flavor}.

events.name: Independence Stirrings
events.narrative: Revolutionary ideas are spreading through {location_flavor}. The {dynasty_name} family must decide whether to support the Crown or the cause of independence.

events.name: Tropical Epidemic
events.narrative: A deadly fever has swept through {location_flavor}, claiming lives from the highest haciendas to the lowest villages. The {dynasty_name} family has not been spared from its ravages.

ANCIENT_ROME.description: A patrician family in Ancient Rome, navigating the complex politics of the Republic and early Empire.
ANCIENT_ROME.llm_persona_prompt: You are a Roman historian in the style of Tacitus or Suetonius. Write with gravitas about virtue, honor, and the fate of the Republic/Empire. Include occasional Latin phrases and references to omens or the will of the gods.

events.name: Military Triumph
events.narrative: The streets of Rome echoed with cheers as a member of the {dynasty_name} family celebrated a triumph, parading captured enemies and spoils of war through the city.

events.name: Senate Conspiracy
events.narrative: Whispers in the Senate, daggers hidden in togas. A conspiracy has formed against the {dynasty_name} family. Beware the Ides of March...

events.name: Provincial Appointment
events.narrative: A member of the {dynasty_name} family has been appointed governor of a wealthy province. A chance for glory, wealth, and corruption far from the watchful eyes of Rome.

events.name: Gladiatorial Games
events.narrative: The {dynasty_name} family has sponsored magnificent gladiatorial games, earning the adoration of the plebs and the respect of their peers. Panem et circenses!

events.name: Slave Revolt
events.narrative: The slaves of the {dynasty_name} estates have risen in revolt! Blood has been spilled, and the family's honor demands a swift and merciless response.

BYZANTINE_EMPIRE.description: A noble family in the Byzantine Empire, balancing court intrigue, religious politics, and external threats.
BYZANTINE_EMPIRE.llm_persona_prompt: You are a Byzantine court chronicler, writing with elaborate formality and religious references. Focus on imperial ceremony, theological disputes, and the complex web of court intrigue. Use occasional Greek terms and references to Orthodox Christianity.

events.name: Imperial Favor
events.narrative: The Emperor has shown great favor to the {dynasty_name} family, granting them a prestigious court position and gifts of gold and silk.

events.name: Blinding Plot
events.narrative: A plot has been uncovered to blind the head of the {dynasty_name} family! The traditional Byzantine punishment would remove them from imperial contention forever.

events.name: Theological Dispute
events.narrative: The {dynasty_name} family has become embroiled in a complex theological dispute. Their stance on the nature of Christ could determine their political future.

events.name: Silk Trade Monopoly
events.narrative: Through clever maneuvering, the {dynasty_name} family has secured a monopoly on silk trade with the East, bringing great wealth to their coffers.

events.name: Crusader Threat
events.narrative: The Latin crusaders have turned their eyes from Jerusalem to Constantinople. The {dynasty_name} family must prepare to defend the city against these Western barbarians.

IMPERIAL_CHINA.description: A noble family in Imperial China, navigating the complex bureaucracy, Confucian values, and dynastic cycles.
IMPERIAL_CHINA.llm_persona_prompt: You are an imperial Chinese court historian, writing with elegant formality and Confucian values. Focus on filial piety, scholarly achievement, and the mandate of heaven. Use occasional references to the classics and natural omens as signs of heaven's favor or displeasure.

events.name: Imperial Examination Success
events.narrative: A son of the {dynasty_name} family has achieved the highest rank in the imperial examinations! His success brings great honor to the family and opens doors to high office.

events.name: Court Faction Struggle
events.narrative: The {dynasty_name} family has become entangled in a dangerous factional struggle at court. They must navigate carefully between rival eunuchs, scholars, and imperial relatives.

events.name: Peasant Rebellion
events.narrative: Peasants have risen in rebellion in the {dynasty_name} family's province! Heaven's mandate seems to waver as famine and discontent spread.

events.name: Artistic Patronage
events.narrative: The {dynasty_name} family has become renowned patrons of the arts, commissioning beautiful paintings, poetry, and porcelain that will be remembered for generations.

events.name: Northern Invasion
events.narrative: Barbarians from the north have breached the Great Wall! The {dynasty_name} family must decide whether to fight, flee, or attempt to negotiate with these fearsome invaders.

MUGHAL_INDIA.description: A noble family in Mughal India, balancing Islamic and Hindu influences in a time of artistic and architectural splendor.
MUGHAL_INDIA.llm_persona_prompt: You are a Mughal court chronicler, writing with elaborate Persian-influenced style. Focus on the grandeur of the empire, artistic and architectural achievements, and the complex religious politics of the realm. Use occasional Persian or Urdu terms and poetic metaphors.

events.name: Architectural Commission
events.narrative: The {dynasty_name} family has commissioned a magnificent building of marble and precious stones, a monument that will stand for centuries as a testament to their glory and taste.

events.name: Imperial Marriage Alliance
events.narrative: A daughter of the {dynasty_name} family has been married into the imperial household, creating a powerful alliance that elevates the family's status at court.

events.name: Religious Policy Dispute
events.narrative: The {dynasty_name} family finds itself at the center of tensions between Islamic orthodoxy and Hindu traditions. Their stance will affect their standing with both the emperor and the people.

events.name: Trade Monopoly
events.narrative: Through imperial favor, the {dynasty_name} family has secured a monopoly on trade in valuable spices, bringing great wealth to their coffers.

events.name: Succession Conflict
events.narrative: As the emperor's health fails, the princes prepare for war. The {dynasty_name} family must choose which prince to support in the coming succession struggle.

RENAISSANCE_ITALY.description: A powerful merchant family in Renaissance Italy, balancing commerce, art patronage, and political intrigue in city-states.
RENAISSANCE_ITALY.llm_persona_prompt: You are a Renaissance Italian chronicler, writing with humanist elegance. Focus on the achievements of great individuals, artistic patronage, and the complex political maneuvering of the city-states. Use occasional Latin phrases and references to classical antiquity.

events.name: Artistic Masterpiece
events.narrative: The {dynasty_name} family has commissioned a magnificent work of art from one of the great masters of the age. This masterpiece will bring them prestige for generations to come.

events.name: Banking Expansion
events.narrative: The {dynasty_name} bank has expanded its operations, opening new branches across Europe and securing loans to kings and princes. Their wealth grows with each passing day.

events.name: Political Conspiracy
events.narrative: A conspiracy has been uncovered against the {dynasty_name} family! Daggers in the dark and poison in the wine threaten to end their rule of the city.

events.name: Papal Election Influence
events.narrative: The conclave to elect a new Pope has begun, and the {dynasty_name} family is using all its influence to secure the election of a favorable candidate. The future of Italy may hang in the balance.

events.name: Strategic Marriage
events.narrative: A strategic marriage has been arranged between the {dynasty_name} family and another powerful dynasty. This alliance will strengthen their position in the complex web of Italian politics.
